column2: As a young member of the Hwarang I have often encountered older members that are eager to give me suggestions about what I could do better. These suggestions tend to be rather limited, however, so maybe I should approach someone like [hwarang_mentor.GetBestName] to see if I could get some more extensive guidance?
I'll ask [hwarang_mentor.GetHerHim]!
I don't want to bother [hwarang_mentor.GetHerHim]...

Today I was approached by [From.GetBestName], a younger member of the Hwarang. It seems [From.GetSheHe] wishes to learn how to become a better member of the Hwarang and that [From.GetSheHe] thinks I am someone that could give [From.GetHerHim] some guidance in that regard.
Of course!
I think not!
[From.GetBestName] has agreed to give me some more extensive guidance to let me be a better member of the Hwarang in the future.
Just was I expected!
[From.GetHerHim] has informed me that [From.GetSheHe] does not have the time or the interest to help me become a better member of the Hwarang.
How rude!

[From.GetBestName] has given me several useful lessons recently, focusing on teaching me how to better at fighting. I expect the Hwarang as a whole will approve of both my progress and [From.GetHerHis] help.
This has been beneficial!

I have been giving [From.GetBestName] quite a few lessons recently, focusing on teaching [From.GetHerHim] to fight. These lessons have gone well, and I expect that the Hwarang as a whole will approve.
I hope this benefits [From.GetHerHim]!

[From.GetBestName] has given me several useful lessons recently, focusing on teaching me how to better at warfare. I expect the Hwarang as a whole will approve of both my progress and [From.GetHerHis] help.
This has been beneficial!

I have been giving [From.GetBestName] quite a few lessons recently, focusing on teaching [From.GetHerHim] about warfare. These lessons have gone well, and I expect that the Hwarang as a whole will approve.
I hope this benefits [From.GetHerHim]!

[From.GetBestName] has given me several lessons recently, and it is clear to me that the two of us are unlikely to ever se eye to eye. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a most disagree individual, and I would prefer to never see [From.GetHerHim] again.
This was a mistake!

I have been giving [From.GetBestName] quite a few lessons recently, and it is clear to me that the two of us are unlikely to ever se eye to eye. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a most disagree individual, and I would prefer to never see [From.GetHerHim] again.
This was a mistake!

There are many people that know quite a lot when it comes to religious matters that are loosely associated with the Hwarang, and a few of them have taken an interest in me, offering to give me some religious schooling on matters relevant to the Hwarang.
This could be useful!
This would be a waste of time...
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself appreciating all kinds of learning as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself better equipped to be a chaste individual as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself better equipped to be a temperate individual as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself better equipped to be a charitable individual as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself better equipped to be a diligent individual as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself better equipped to be a patient individual as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself better equipped to be a kind individual as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have found myself better equipped to be a humble individual as a result.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has really been quite interesting, and I have a much better understanding of various matters related to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith now.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have received has gone well, and several of my teachers have let me know that they feel I really have a good understanding of matters of faith.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have received has gone well, and several other members of the Hwarang have let me know that they appreciate the effort I have put into being a good student.
That was quite useful!
The religious schooling I have recaived has not been interesting, and the only thing I have learned about the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is that it is contradictory and possibly wrong.
That was quite useless!
The religious schooling I have received has gone rather poorly, and several of my teachers have let me know that they feel I really have a poor understanding of matters of faith.
That was quite useless!
The religious schooling I have received has gone rather poorly, and several other members of the Hwarang have let me know that they do not think I really was a good student.
That was quite useless!

Lately I have found myself considering whether [hwarang_recruit.GetBestName] would be a good member of the Hwarang. Seeing as I am a member, I could perhaps recruit [hwarang_recruit.GetHerHim] in that case.
I'll suggest [hwarang_recruit.GetSheHe] joins the Hwarang!
[hwarang_recruit.GetSheHeCap] would not be a good member...

There are many reasons why someone might want to join the Hwarang, so there are many arguments I could make to try to make [hwarang_recruit.GetBestName] join, but I need to focus on something to make a compelling argument.
I will speak of the diplomatic benefits!
[Root.GetBestName] will attempt to use [Root.GetHerHis] Diplomacy skill to convince [hwarang_recruit.GetBestName] to join the Hwarang
I will speak of the benefits related to warfare!
[Root.GetBestName] will attempt to use [Root.GetHerHis] Martial skill to convince [hwarang_recruit.GetBestName] to join the Hwarang
I will speak of the administrative benefits!
[Root.GetBestName] will attempt to use [Root.GetHerHis] Stewardship skill to convince [hwarang_recruit.GetBestName] to join the Hwarang
I will speak of the benefits related to religion!
[Root.GetBestName] will attempt to use [Root.GetHerHis] Learning skill to convince [hwarang_recruit.GetBestName] to join the Hwarang
It seems [From.GetBestName] thinks that I should become a member of the Hwarang as [From.GetSheHe] has suggested that it would be in my interest to join, pointing out the many diplomatic benefits.
I'll join!
I don't think that's for me...

It seems [From.GetBestName] thinks that I should become a member of the Hwarang as [From.GetSheHe] has suggested that it would be in my interest to join, pointing out the many benefits related to warfare.
I'll join!
I don't think that's for me...

It seems [From.GetBestName] thinks that I should become a member of the Hwarang as [From.GetSheHe] has suggested that it would be in my interest to join, pointing out the many administrative benefits.
I'll join!
I don't think that's for me...

It seems [From.GetBestName] thinks that I should become a member of the Hwarang as [From.GetSheHe] has suggested that it would be in my interest to join, pointing out the many benefits related to religion.
I'll join!
I don't think that's for me...
My attempt to convince [From.GetBestName] to join the Hwarang was not in vain, as [From.GetSheHe] has informed me that [From.GetSheHe] is willing to join the society at once.
That's great!
Despite doing my best to make [From.GetBestName] see the benefits of joining the Hwarang [From.GetSheHe] has told me that [From.GetSheHe] sees little reason to join the society.
I see...

Despite the Hwarang valuing cooperation and trust in its ranks there are those that are not worthy of either, such as [nammo.GetBestName]. I do not like her, and she does not like me, and perhaps it would be for the best if she no longer was among the living...
I will try to meet and kill her!
It would be wrong...

My rival, [junjeong.GetBestName], has invited me to an informal meeting at a tea house, supposedly to discuss our differences. The Hwarang would approve of me attending, without a doubt, but I am not sure meeting with her is all that appealing.
I will humor her...
I don't think so!
I will prepare for a trap...
It is an unnecessary risk...

[nammo.GetBestName] has refused to meet with me, offering no reasonable excuse. I am not sure if she suspected a trap or not, but it is clear I will have to figure out some other way to get her out of the way.
Cowardly, but not foolish...
[nammo.GetBestName] has agreed to meet me at a tea house. It is possible she suspects a trap, but at least I will have an opportunity to get her out of the way.
Brave, but foolish...
I have arrived at the tea house where I am to meet with [nammo.GetBestName] and it is time for me to decide how to approach the matter of her death or whether I should abandon the whole idea.
I will arrange for her tea to be poisoned!
I will try to cut her down once we are seated!
Maybe I should leave her be...
Actually, maybe it is time for our rivalry to end?

I arrived at the tea house shortly after [junjeong.GetBestName] and greeted her as courteously as I could given my dislike for her. It did not take long for our tea to arrive, and it was well worth the wait.
This is some good tea!
[nammo.GetBestName] arrived shortly afer me and we exchanged greetings as courteously as we could. It did not take long for the tea to arrive, and [nammo.GetBestName] drank hers quite eagerly.
Everything is going as planned!

I found myself wondering whether [nammo.GetBestName] would notice that something was wrong before we were finished at the tea house, but she clearly did not, and I made sure to have an excuse ready to leave rather quickly.
It won't be long now!

[junjeong.GetBestName] had to leave our meeting rather abruptly, which certainly was to my liking. Shortly after she left I started feeling unwell, and before long all of my strength was slipping away...
Poison...

It did not take long for the agent I left behind at the tea house to catch up to me with word that [nammo.GetBestName] died from the poison in her tea and that the local authorities seem to think that she died of natural causes.
Good riddance!

I arrived at the tea house shortly after [junjeong.GetBestName] and after receiving word from my agents that [junjeong.GetBestName] had arranged to have my tea poisoned. When the tea is served, I will need to have a plan for how to handle it.
I will try to make her drink it!
I will swap our tea cups, hopefully poisoning my rival, [junjeong.GetBestName]
I will knock it over...
I will spill my tea, ensuring that nobody drinks the poison
[nammo.GetBestName] arrived shortly afer me and we exchanged greetings as courteously as we could. It did not take long for the tea to arrive, and [nammo.GetBestName] drank hers quite eagerly.
Everything is going as planned!

[junjeong.GetBestName] did not notice the swap, and though it was a bit difficult to do so I managed to keep myself from smiling as she made an excuse to leave early, knowing that things were not going as she had expected.
She's already dead!

I made sure to have an excuse ready to leave rather quickly and thus departed well before [nammo.GetBestName] was finished at the tea house. However, not long after I left I found my strength slipping away, and realized that things had not gone as planned...
She... tricked me...

I had my agent follow [junjeong.GetBestName] as she left the tea house and it did not take long before I heard that she had collapsed on the road and that none of her servants had managed to save her life. Even better, nobody suspects foul play.
Good riddance!

[nammo.GetBestName] apparently suspects poison, seeing as she swaps our cups in a manner that is not quite as stealthily as she thinks it is. I should certainly not drink my tea, but the question is what I should do now that my plan has been foiled.
I will spill it and try to make this end peacefully...
It is time for a more direct approach!
I will attack my rival, abandoning all subtlety

[junjeong.GetBestName] spills her tea before drinking any of it and arranges to have a new cup delivered at once. It is unclear if she noticed the swap or if she was just a bit clumsy, but it is clear that we are both going to be leaving alive.
Well, that ends that...
Matters at the tea house did not go as expected. Both I and [nammo.GetBestName] survived, and she likely knows I am trying to kill her now. Worse, she might be trying to kill me too.
I need to watch my back...

Both I and [junjeong.GetBestName] survived our meeting, but it is clear that she is trying to kill me, and she might suspect that I am trying to kill her even if I only attempted to turn matters around.
I need to watch my back...
Before either of us can start drinking our tea [junjeong.GetBestName] pulls free a dagger and lunges at me, letting out a loud battle cry. It is clear one of us will not be alive much longer.
I will kill you before you kill me!

I attack [nammo.GetBestName] with my dagger and she pulls out one of her own. It is unclear if she expected such an attack or not, but before long she gains the upper hand and I find myself on the floor, bleeding out.
No! No! No!

I pull out a dagger of my own and defend myself against [junjeong.GetBestName]'s attack. It is unclear whether she expected me to put up a fight or not, but before long I gain the upper hand and she finds herself on the floor, bleeding out.
Good riddance!

I attack [nammo.GetBestName] with my dagger and she pulls out one of her own. It is unclear if she expected such an attack or not, but before long I gain the upper hand and she finds herself on the floor, bleeding out.
Good riddance!

I pull out a dagger of my own and defend myself against [junjeong.GetBestName]'s attack. It is unclear whether she expected me to put up a fight or not, but before long she gains the upper hand and I finds myself on the floor, bleeding out.
No! No! No!

I do not know if [nammo.GetBestName] suspected that her tea was poisoned or if she was just clumsy, but she managed to spill her tea before drinking any of it. It is clear my plan has failed, and safest to take no further action.
Well, that ends that...
It is hard to tell if [nammo.GetBestName] is more suspicious towards me than usual when it is time to leave the tea house, but regardless of whether that is the case both of us will be leaving alive.
That did not go as expected...
I do not know if [junjeong.GetBestName] suspects that I intentionally spilled my tea or not, but it is clear that she cannot be trusted at all since she clearly dislikes me enough to try to kill me.
I need to watch my back...
Before either of us can start drinking our tea [junjeong.GetBestName] pulls free a dagger and lunges at me, letting out a loud battle cry. It is clear one of us will not be alive much longer.
I will kill you before you kill me!

I attack [nammo.GetBestName] with my dagger and she pulls out one of her own. It is unclear if she expected such an attack or not, but before long she gains the upper hand and I find myself on the floor, bleeding out.
No! No! No!

I pull out a dagger of my own and defend myself against [junjeong.GetBestName]'s attack. It is unclear whether she expected me to put up a fight or not, but before long I gain the upper hand and she finds herself on the floor, bleeding out.
Good riddance!

[junjeong.GetBestName] and I converse for a while while drinking our tea. We manage to avoid various topics that would make it hard for us to have a civil conversation, even if things certainly are a bit strained.

[junjeong.GetBestName] surprises me when I arrive at the tea house by greeting me in a rather friendly manner. Shortly after the tea arrives, she surprises me even more by suggesting that maybe it is time for us to put our rivalry aside, seeing as the Hwarang as a whole disapprove of it.
I suppose that's agreeable...

The Hwarang as a whole will likely approve of my attempt to end my rivalry with [nammo.GetBestName] even though it did not work out, but it is rather clear that [nammo.GetBestName] is someone I need to be wary of as she clearly does not like me.

It is very likely that the Hwarang will not approve of my refusal to end my rivalry with [junjeong.GetBestName], but I do not trust her, and I should be wary of her even though she claims to want to reconcile with me.

A young man by the name of [new_hwarang.GetBestName] has approached me with an offer to enter my service in exchange for me helping him become a member of the Hwarang despite the fact that he hardly is from an influential family.
I will put in a good word for you!

With many members of the Hwarang having an interest in Buddhism it is not unusual for monks and nuns to work closely with certain Hwarang, and one such individual has approached me and offered to work for me.

One of the guiding principles of the Hwarang is to show loyalty towards one's liege, and as a member of the Hwarang I am naturally expected to show such loyalty. Perhaps it would be a good idea to visit my liege's court to show my loyalty in person?
I will visit [hwarang_liege.GetHerHim]!
I have better things to do...

A member of the Hwarang, [From.GetBestName], has arrived at my court, supposedly intending to show [From.GetHerHis] loyalty in accordance with the guiding principles of the Hwarang. Should I welcome this unexpected guest?
I'll welcome [From.GetHerHim], of course!
I have no time for [From.GetHerHim]!

It seems [From.GetBestName] does not value my loyalty as much as I expected as [From.GetSheHe] sent a servant to inform me that [From.GetSheHe] did not have time to deal with an unexpected guest and that [From.GetSheHe] thought it best if I returned some other time.

[From.GetBestName] welcomed me personally when I arrived and seemed quite pleased to see me even though I had not let [From.GetHerHim] know I was coming. Now I need to decide what I can do to show my appreciation and loyalty.

I'll freely give up a claim

[From.GetBestName] was quite pleased with my offer to teach [From.GetHerHim] how to be a bit more virtuous, and being a member of the Hwarang I had little difficulty figuring out what woudl be reasoanble advice to give [From.GetHerHim].
